item.description:
This week, we will be checking out work from two of our members. Terry will be posting his next chapter to his novel (his first chapter is previous in the Files section if you're interested), and Michael will be posting a short story or possibly a poem or two! Please check in our Files section for their work, read, and be prepared with comments if you can make it.

***$3.00 workshopping fee only applies to the two members whose work we will be reviewing!***
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs in the cafe loft, trying to save seats!
item.name: Workshop Meetup
